CardData.Name: Talon Grip
CardData.Description: Grab the enemy to deal 40 damage. 40% chance to inflict Singe (Deal 5 damage per turn for 2 turns.)

CardData.Name: Avenger
CardData.Description: Increase your speed for two turns. For each dead ally, increase the damage of your next attack by 25%.

CardData.Name: Relentless
CardData.Description: Attack the enemy to deal 60 damage and recover 50% of total damage dealt.
